<Link id="l01422" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1422"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01423" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1423"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Emit instructions to copy a Reduce list, which contains partially</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01424" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1424"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// aggregated values, in the specified direction.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01425" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1425"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> emitReductionListCopy(</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01426" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1426"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/openmpirbuilder/#aafc1886793b898052f87edd7e9fdbaa3">InsertPointTy</a> AllocaIP, CopyAction Action, <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/demangle/itaniumdemangle-h/#a88ee8e4eea43084bd8964682683da88caa1fa27779242b4902f7ae3bdd5c6d508">Type</a> &#42;ReductionArrayTy,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01427" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1427"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab9c6b351507d3c0730f4290919d43a12">ArrayRef&lt;ReductionInfo&gt;</a> ReductionInfos, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a066e2a31a13d6520e52ae1944f194662">Value</a> &#42;SrcBase, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a066e2a31a13d6520e52ae1944f194662">Value</a> &#42;DestBase,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01428" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1428"><Highlight kind="normal">      CopyOptionsTy CopyOptions = &#123;</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">nullptr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">nullptr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">nullptr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01429" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1429"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01430" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1430"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Emit a helper that reduces data across two OpenMP threads (lanes)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01431" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1431"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// in the same warp.  It uses shuffle instructions to copy over data from</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01432" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1432"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// a remote lane&#39;s stack.  The reduction algorithm performed is specified</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01433" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1433"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// by the fourth parameter.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01434" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1434"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01435" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1435"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Algorithm Versions.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01436" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1436"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Full Warp Reduce (argument value 0):</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01437" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1437"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///   This algorithm assumes that all 32 lanes are active and gathers</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01438" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1438"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///   data from these 32 lanes, producing a single resultant value.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01439" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1439"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Contiguous Partial Warp Reduce (argument value 1):</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01440" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1440"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///   This algorithm assumes that only a &#42;contiguous&#42; subset of lanes</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01441" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1441"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///   are active.  This happens for the last warp in a parallel region</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01442" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1442"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///   when the user specified num&#95;threads is not an integer multiple of</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01443" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1443"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///   32  This contiguous subset always starts with the zeroth lane.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01444" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1444"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Partial Warp Reduce (argument value 2):</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01445" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1445"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///   This algorithm gathers data from any number of lanes at any position.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01446" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1446"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// All reduced values are stored in the lowest possible lane.  The set</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01447" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1447"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// of problems every algorithm addresses is a super set of those</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01448" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1448"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// addressable by algorithms with a lower version number.  Overhead</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01449" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1449"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// increases as algorithm version increases.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01450" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1450"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01451" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1451"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Terminology</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01452" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1452"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Reduce element:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01453" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1453"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///   Reduce element refers to the individual data field with primitive</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01454" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1454"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///   data types to be combined and reduced across threads.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01455" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1455"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Reduce list:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01456" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1456"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///   Reduce list refers to a collection of local, thread-private</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01457" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1457"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///   reduce elements.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01458" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1458"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Remote Reduce list:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01459" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1459"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///   Remote Reduce list refers to a collection of remote (relative to</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01460" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1460"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///   the current thread) reduce elements.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01461" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1461"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01462" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1462"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// We distinguish between three states of threads that are important to</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01463" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1463"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// the implementation of this function.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01464" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1464"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Alive threads:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01465" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1465"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///   Threads in a warp executing the SIMT instruction, as distinguished from</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01466" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1466"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///   threads that are inactive due to divergent control flow.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01467" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1467"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Active threads:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01468" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1468"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///   The minimal set of threads that has to be alive upon entry to this</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01469" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1469"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///   function.  The computation is correct iff active threads are alive.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01470" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1470"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///   Some threads are alive but they are not active because they do not</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01471" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1471"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///   contribute to the computation in any useful manner.  Turning them off</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01472" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1472"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///   may introduce control flow overheads without any tangible benefits.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01473" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1473"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Effective threads:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01474" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1474"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///   In order to comply with the argument requirements of the shuffle</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01475" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1475"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///   function, we must keep all lanes holding data alive.  But at most</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01476" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1476"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///   half of them perform value aggregation; we refer to this half of</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01477" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1477"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///   threads as effective. The other half is simply handing off their</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01478" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1478"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///   data.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01479" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1479"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01480" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1480"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Procedure</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01481" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1481"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Value shuffle:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01482" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1482"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///   In this step active threads transfer data from higher lane positions</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01483" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1483"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///   in the warp to lower lane positions, creating Remote Reduce list.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01484" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1484"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Value aggregation:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01485" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1485"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///   In this step, effective threads combine their thread local Reduce list</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01486" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1486"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///   with Remote Reduce list and store the result in the thread local</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01487" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1487"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///   Reduce list.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01488" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1488"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Value copy:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01489" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1489"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///   In this step, we deal with the assumption made by algorithm 2</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01490" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1490"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///   (i.e. contiguity assumption).  When we have an odd number of lanes</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01491" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1491"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///   active, say 2k+1, only k threads will be effective and therefore k</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01492" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1492"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///   new values will be produced.  However, the Reduce list owned by the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01493" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1493"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///   (2k+1)th thread is ignored in the value aggregation.  Therefore</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01494" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1494"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///   we copy the Reduce list from the (2k+1)th lane to (k+1)th lane so</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01495" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1495"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///   that the contiguity assumption still holds.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01496" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1496"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01497" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1497"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// \\param ReductionInfos Array type containing the ReductionOps.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01498" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1498"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// \\param ReduceFn The reduction function.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01499" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1499"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// \\param FuncAttrs Optional param to specify any function attributes that</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01500" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1500"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///                  need to be copied to the new function.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01501" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1501"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01502" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1502"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// \\return The ShuffleAndReduce function.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01503" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1503"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/codeview/#adfebd8c4ae29ccd84c600c1e65d6b807a86408593c34af77fdd90df932f8b5261">Function</a> &#42;emitShuffleAndReduceFunction(</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01507" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1507"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// This function emits a helper that gathers Reduce lists from the first</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01508" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1508"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// lane of every active warp to lanes in the first warp.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01509" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1509"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01510" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1510"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// void inter&#95;warp&#95;copy&#95;func(void&#42; reduce&#95;data, num&#95;warps)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01511" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1511"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///   shared smem&#91;warp&#95;size&#93;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01512" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1512"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///   For all data entries D in reduce&#95;data:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01513" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1513"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///     sync</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01516" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1516"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///     sync</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01517" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1517"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///     if (I am the first warp)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01518" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1518"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///       Copy smem&#91;thread&#95;id&#93; to my local D</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01519" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1519"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01611" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1611"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01612" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1612"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Emits reduction function.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01613" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1613"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// \\param ReducerName Name of the function calling the reduction.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01614" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1614"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// \\param ReductionInfos Array type containing the ReductionOps.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01615" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1615"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// \\param ReductionGenCBKind Optional param to specify Clang or MLIR</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01616" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1616"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///                           CodeGenCB kind.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01617" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1617"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// \\param FuncAttrs Optional param to specify any function attributes that</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01618" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1618"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///                  need to be copied to the new function.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01619" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1619"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01620" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1620"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// \\return The reduction function.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01621" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1621"><Highlight kind="normal">  Expected&lt;Function &#42;&gt; createReductionFunction(</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01622" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1622"><Highlight kind="normal">      StringRef ReducerName, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab9c6b351507d3c0730f4290919d43a12">ArrayRef&lt;ReductionInfo&gt;</a> ReductionInfos,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01623" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1623"><Highlight kind="normal">      ReductionGenCBKind ReductionGenCBKind = ReductionGenCBKind::MLIR,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01624" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1624"><Highlight kind="normal">      AttributeList FuncAttrs = &#123;&#125;);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01625" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1625"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01626" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1626"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">public</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">:</Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01627" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1627"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01628" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1628"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Design of OpenMP reductions on the GPU</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01629" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1629"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01630" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1630"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Consider a typical OpenMP program with one or more reduction</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01631" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1631"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// clauses:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01632" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1632"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01633" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1633"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// float foo;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01634" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1634"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// double bar;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01635" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1635"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// #pragma omp target teams distribute parallel for \\</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01636" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1636"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///             reduction(+:foo) reduction(&#42;:bar)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01637" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1637"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// for (int i = 0; i &lt; N; i++) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01638" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1638"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///   foo += A&#91;i&#93;; bar &#42;= B&#91;i&#93;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01639" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1639"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01640" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1640"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01641" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1641"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// where &#39;foo&#39; and &#39;bar&#39; are reduced across all OpenMP threads in</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01642" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1642"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// all teams.  In our OpenMP implementation on the NVPTX device an</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01643" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1643"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// OpenMP team is mapped to a CUDA threadblock and OpenMP threads</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01644" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1644"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// within a team are mapped to CUDA threads within a threadblock.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01645" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1645"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Our goal is to efficiently aggregate values across all OpenMP</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01646" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1646"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// threads such that:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01647" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1647"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01648" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1648"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///   - the compiler and runtime are logically concise, and</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01649" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1649"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///   - the reduction is performed efficiently in a hierarchical</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01650" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1650"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///     manner as follows: within OpenMP threads in the same warp,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01651" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1651"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///     across warps in a threadblock, and finally across teams on</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01652" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1652"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///     the NVPTX device.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01653" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1653"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01654" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1654"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Introduction to Decoupling</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01655" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1655"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01656" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1656"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// We would like to decouple the compiler and the runtime so that the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01657" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1657"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// latter is ignorant of the reduction variables (number, data types)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01658" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1658"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// and the reduction operators.  This allows a simpler interface</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01659" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1659"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// and implementation while still attaining good performance.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01660" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1660"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01661" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1661"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Pseudocode for the aforementioned OpenMP program generated by the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01662" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1662"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// compiler is as follows:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01663" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1663"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01664" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1664"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// 1 Create private copies of reduction variables on each OpenMP</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01665" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1665"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///    thread: &#39;foo&#95;private&#39;, &#39;bar&#95;private&#39;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01666" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1666"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// 2 Each OpenMP thread reduces the chunk of &#39;A&#39; and &#39;B&#39; assigned</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01667" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1667"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///    to it and writes the result in &#39;foo&#95;private&#39; and &#39;bar&#95;private&#39;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01668" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1668"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///    respectively.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01669" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1669"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// 3 Call the OpenMP runtime on the GPU to reduce within a team</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01670" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1670"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///    and store the result on the team master:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01671" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1671"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01672" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1672"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///     &#95;&#95;kmpc&#95;nvptx&#95;parallel&#95;reduce&#95;nowait&#95;v2(...,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01673" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1673"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///        reduceData, shuffleReduceFn, interWarpCpyFn)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01674" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1674"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01675" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1675"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///     where:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01676" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1676"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///       struct ReduceData &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01677" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1677"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///         double &#42;foo;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01678" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1678"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///         double &#42;bar;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01679" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1679"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///       &#125; reduceData</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01680" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1680"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///       reduceData.foo = &amp;foo&#95;private</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01681" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1681"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///       reduceData.bar = &amp;bar&#95;private</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01682" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1682"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01683" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1683"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///     &#39;shuffleReduceFn&#39; and &#39;interWarpCpyFn&#39; are pointers to two</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01684" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1684"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///     auxiliary functions generated by the compiler that operate on</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01685" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1685"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///     variables of type &#39;ReduceData&#39;.  They aid the runtime perform</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01686" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1686"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///     algorithmic steps in a data agnostic manner.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01687" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1687"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01688" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1688"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///     &#39;shuffleReduceFn&#39; is a pointer to a function that reduces data</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01689" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1689"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///     of type &#39;ReduceData&#39; across two OpenMP threads (lanes) in the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01690" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1690"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///     same warp.  It takes the following arguments as input:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01691" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1691"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01692" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1692"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///     a. variable of type &#39;ReduceData&#39; on the calling lane,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01693" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1693"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///     b. its lane&#95;id,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01694" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1694"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///     c. an offset relative to the current lane&#95;id to generate a</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01695" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1695"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///        remote&#95;lane&#95;id.  The remote lane contains the second</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01696" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1696"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///        variable of type &#39;ReduceData&#39; that is to be reduced.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01697" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1697"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///     d. an algorithm version parameter determining which reduction</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01698" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1698"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///        algorithm to use.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01699" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1699"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01700" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1700"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///     &#39;shuffleReduceFn&#39; retrieves data from the remote lane using</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01701" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1701"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///     efficient GPU shuffle intrinsics and reduces, using the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01702" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1702"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///     algorithm specified by the 4th parameter, the two operands</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01703" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1703"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///     element-wise.  The result is written to the first operand.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01704" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1704"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01705" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1705"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///     Different reduction algorithms are implemented in different</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01706" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1706"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///     runtime functions, all calling &#39;shuffleReduceFn&#39; to perform</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01707" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1707"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///     the essential reduction step.  Therefore, based on the 4th</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01708" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1708"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///     parameter, this function behaves slightly differently to</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01709" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1709"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///     cooperate with the runtime to ensure correctness under</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01710" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1710"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///     different circumstances.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01711" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1711"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01712" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1712"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///     &#39;InterWarpCpyFn&#39; is a pointer to a function that transfers</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01713" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1713"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///     reduced variables across warps.  It tunnels, through CUDA</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01714" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1714"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///     shared memory, the thread-private data of type &#39;ReduceData&#39;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01715" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1715"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///     from lane 0 of each warp to a lane in the first warp.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01716" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1716"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// 4 Call the OpenMP runtime on the GPU to reduce across teams.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01717" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1717"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///    The last team writes the global reduced value to memory.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01718" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1718"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01719" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1719"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///     ret = &#95;&#95;kmpc&#95;nvptx&#95;teams&#95;reduce&#95;nowait(...,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01720" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1720"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///             reduceData, shuffleReduceFn, interWarpCpyFn,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01721" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1721"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///             scratchpadCopyFn, loadAndReduceFn)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01722" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1722"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01723" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1723"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///     &#39;scratchpadCopyFn&#39; is a helper that stores reduced</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01724" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1724"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///     data from the team master to a scratchpad array in</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01725" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1725"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///     global memory.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01726" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1726"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01727" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1727"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///     &#39;loadAndReduceFn&#39; is a helper that loads data from</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01728" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1728"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///     the scratchpad array and reduces it with the input</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01729" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1729"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///     operand.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01730" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1730"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01731" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1731"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///     These compiler generated functions hide address</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01732" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1732"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///     calculation and alignment information from the runtime.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01733" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1733"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// 5 if ret == 1:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01734" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1734"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///     The team master of the last team stores the reduced</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01735" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1735"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///     result to the globals in memory.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01736" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1736"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///     foo += reduceData.foo; bar &#42;= reduceData.bar</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01737" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1737"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01738" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1738"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01739" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1739"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Warp Reduction Algorithms</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01740" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1740"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01741" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1741"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// On the warp level, we have three algorithms implemented in the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01742" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1742"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// OpenMP runtime depending on the number of active lanes:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01743" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1743"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01744" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1744"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Full Warp Reduction</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01745" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1745"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01746" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1746"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// The reduce algorithm within a warp where all lanes are active</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01747" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1747"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// is implemented in the runtime as follows:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01748" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1748"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01749" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1749"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// full&#95;warp&#95;reduce(void &#42;reduce&#95;data,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01750" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1750"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///                  kmp&#95;ShuffleReductFctPtr ShuffleReduceFn) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01751" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1751"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///   for (int offset = WARPSIZE/2; offset &gt; 0; offset /= 2)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01752" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1752"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///     ShuffleReduceFn(reduce&#95;data, 0, offset, 0);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01753" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1753"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01754" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1754"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01755" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1755"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// The algorithm completes in log(2, WARPSIZE) steps.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01756" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1756"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01757" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1757"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// &#39;ShuffleReduceFn&#39; is used here with lane&#95;id set to 0 because it is</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01758" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1758"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// not used therefore we save instructions by not retrieving lane&#95;id</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01759" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1759"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// from the corresponding special registers.  The 4th parameter, which</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01760" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1760"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// represents the version of the algorithm being used, is set to 0 to</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01761" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1761"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// signify full warp reduction.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01762" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1762"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01763" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1763"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// In this version, &#39;ShuffleReduceFn&#39; behaves, per element, as follows:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01764" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1764"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01765" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1765"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// #reduce&#95;elem refers to an element in the local lane&#39;s data structure</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01766" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1766"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// #remote&#95;elem is retrieved from a remote lane</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01767" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1767"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// remote&#95;elem = shuffle&#95;down(reduce&#95;elem, offset, WARPSIZE);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01768" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1768"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// reduce&#95;elem = reduce&#95;elem REDUCE&#95;OP remote&#95;elem;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01769" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1769"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01770" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1770"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Contiguous Partial Warp Reduction</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01771" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1771"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01772" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1772"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// This reduce algorithm is used within a warp where only the first</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01773" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1773"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// &#39;n&#39; (n &lt;= WARPSIZE) lanes are active.  It is typically used when the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01774" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1774"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// number of OpenMP threads in a parallel region is not a multiple of</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01775" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1775"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// WARPSIZE.  The algorithm is implemented in the runtime as follows:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01776" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1776"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01777" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1777"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// void</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01778" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1778"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// contiguous&#95;partial&#95;reduce(void &#42;reduce&#95;data,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01779" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1779"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///                           kmp&#95;ShuffleReductFctPtr ShuffleReduceFn,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01780" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1780"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///                           int size, int lane&#95;id) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01781" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1781"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///   int curr&#95;size;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01782" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1782"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///   int offset;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01783" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1783"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///   curr&#95;size = size;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01784" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1784"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///   mask = curr&#95;size/2;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01785" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1785"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///   while (offset&gt;0) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01786" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1786"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///     ShuffleReduceFn(reduce&#95;data, lane&#95;id, offset, 1);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01787" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1787"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///     curr&#95;size = (curr&#95;size+1)/2;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01788" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1788"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///     offset = curr&#95;size/2;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01789" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1789"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///   &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01790" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1790"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01791" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1791"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01792" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1792"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// In this version, &#39;ShuffleReduceFn&#39; behaves, per element, as follows:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01793" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1793"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01794" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1794"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// remote&#95;elem = shuffle&#95;down(reduce&#95;elem, offset, WARPSIZE);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01795" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1795"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// if (lane&#95;id &lt; offset)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01796" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1796"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///     reduce&#95;elem = reduce&#95;elem REDUCE&#95;OP remote&#95;elem</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01797" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1797"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// else</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01798" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1798"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///     reduce&#95;elem = remote&#95;elem</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01799" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1799"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01800" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1800"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// This algorithm assumes that the data to be reduced are located in a</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01801" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1801"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// contiguous subset of lanes starting from the first.  When there is</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01802" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1802"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// an odd number of active lanes, the data in the last lane is not</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01803" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1803"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// aggregated with any other lane&#39;s dat but is instead copied over.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01804" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1804"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01805" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1805"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Dispersed Partial Warp Reduction</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01806" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1806"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01807" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1807"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// This algorithm is used within a warp when any discontiguous subset of</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01808" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1808"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// lanes are active.  It is used to implement the reduction operation</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01809" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1809"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// across lanes in an OpenMP simd region or in a nested parallel region.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01810" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1810"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01811" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1811"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// void</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01812" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1812"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// dispersed&#95;partial&#95;reduce(void &#42;reduce&#95;data,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01813" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1813"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///                          kmp&#95;ShuffleReductFctPtr ShuffleReduceFn) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01814" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1814"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///   int size, remote&#95;id;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01815" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1815"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///   int logical&#95;lane&#95;id = number&#95;of&#95;active&#95;lanes&#95;before&#95;me() &#42; 2;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01816" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1816"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///   do &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01817" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1817"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///       remote&#95;id = next&#95;active&#95;lane&#95;id&#95;right&#95;after&#95;me();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01818" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1818"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///       # the above function returns 0 of no active lane</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01819" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1819"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///       # is present right after the current lane.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01820" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1820"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///       size = number&#95;of&#95;active&#95;lanes&#95;in&#95;this&#95;warp();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01821" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1821"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///       logical&#95;lane&#95;id /= 2;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01822" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1822"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///       ShuffleReduceFn(reduce&#95;data, logical&#95;lane&#95;id,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01823" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1823"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///                       remote&#95;id-1-threadIdx.x, 2);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01824" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1824"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///   &#125; while (logical&#95;lane&#95;id % 2 == 0 &amp;&amp; size &gt; 1);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01825" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1825"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01826" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1826"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01827" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1827"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// There is no assumption made about the initial state of the reduction.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01828" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1828"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Any number of lanes (&gt;=1) could be active at any position.  The reduction</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01829" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1829"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// result is returned in the first active lane.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01830" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1830"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01831" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1831"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// In this version, &#39;ShuffleReduceFn&#39; behaves, per element, as follows:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01832" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1832"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01833" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1833"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// remote&#95;elem = shuffle&#95;down(reduce&#95;elem, offset, WARPSIZE);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01834" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1834"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// if (lane&#95;id % 2 == 0 &amp;&amp; offset &gt; 0)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01835" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1835"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///     reduce&#95;elem = reduce&#95;elem REDUCE&#95;OP remote&#95;elem</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01836" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1836"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// else</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01837" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1837"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///     reduce&#95;elem = remote&#95;elem</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01838" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1838"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01839" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1839"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01840" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1840"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Intra-Team Reduction</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01841" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1841"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01842" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1842"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// This function, as implemented in the runtime call</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01843" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1843"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// &#39;&#95;&#95;kmpc&#95;nvptx&#95;parallel&#95;reduce&#95;nowait&#95;v2&#39;, aggregates data across OpenMP</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01844" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1844"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// threads in a team.  It first reduces within a warp using the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01845" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1845"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// aforementioned algorithms.  We then proceed to gather all such</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01846" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1846"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// reduced values at the first warp.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01847" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1847"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01848" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1848"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// The runtime makes use of the function &#39;InterWarpCpyFn&#39;, which copies</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01849" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1849"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// data from each of the &quot;warp master&quot; (zeroth lane of each warp, where</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01850" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1850"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// warp-reduced data is held) to the zeroth warp.  This step reduces (in</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01851" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1851"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// a mathematical sense) the problem of reduction across warp masters in</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01852" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1852"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// a block to the problem of warp reduction.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01853" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1853"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01854" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1854"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01855" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1855"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Inter-Team Reduction</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01856" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1856"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01857" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1857"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Once a team has reduced its data to a single value, it is stored in</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01858" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1858"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// a global scratchpad array.  Since each team has a distinct slot, this</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01859" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1859"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// can be done without locking.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01860" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1860"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01861" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1861"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// The last team to write to the scratchpad array proceeds to reduce the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01862" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1862"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// scratchpad array.  One or more workers in the last team use the helper</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01863" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1863"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// &#39;loadAndReduceDataFn&#39; to load and reduce values from the array, i.e.,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01864" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1864"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// the k&#39;th worker reduces every k&#39;th element.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01865" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1865"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01866" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1866"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Finally, a call is made to &#39;&#95;&#95;kmpc&#95;nvptx&#95;parallel&#95;reduce&#95;nowait&#95;v2&#39; to</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01867" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1867"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// reduce across workers and compute a globally reduced value.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01868" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1868"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01869" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1869"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// \\param Loc                The location where the reduction was</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01870" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1870"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///                           encountered. Must be within the associate</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01871" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1871"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///                           directive and after the last local access to the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01872" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1872"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///                           reduction variables.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01873" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1873"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// \\param AllocaIP           An insertion point suitable for allocas usable</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01874" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1874"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///                           in reductions.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01875" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1875"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// \\param CodeGenIP           An insertion point suitable for code</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01876" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1876"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// generation. \\param ReductionInfos     A list of info on each reduction</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01877" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1877"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// variable. \\param IsNoWait           Optional flag set if the reduction is</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01878" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1878"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// marked as</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01879" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1879"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///                           nowait.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01880" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1880"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// \\param IsTeamsReduction   Optional flag set if it is a teams</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01881" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1881"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///                           reduction.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01882" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1882"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// \\param HasDistribute      Optional flag set if it is a</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01883" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1883"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///                           distribute reduction.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01884" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1884"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// \\param GridValue          Optional GPU grid value.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01885" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1885"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// \\param ReductionBufNum    Optional OpenMPCUDAReductionBufNumValue to be</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01886" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1886"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// used for teams reduction.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01887" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1887"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// \\param SrcLocInfo         Source location information global.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01888" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1888"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/openmpirbuilder/#af24d1c61cec57095ced3b08a6dd99ee8">InsertPointOrErrorTy</a> createReductionsGPU(</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01889" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1889"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/openmpirbuilder/locationdescription">LocationDescription</a> &amp;Loc, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/openmpirbuilder/#aafc1886793b898052f87edd7e9fdbaa3">InsertPointTy</a> AllocaIP,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01890" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1890"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/openmpirbuilder/#aafc1886793b898052f87edd7e9fdbaa3">InsertPointTy</a> CodeGenIP, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab9c6b351507d3c0730f4290919d43a12">ArrayRef&lt;ReductionInfo&gt;</a> ReductionInfos,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01891" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1891"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> IsNoWait = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> IsTeamsReduction = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01892" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1892"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> HasDistribute = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">,</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01895" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1895"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a066e2a31a13d6520e52ae1944f194662">Value</a> &#42;SrcLocInfo = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">nullptr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01896" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1896"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01897" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1897"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// TODO: provide atomic and non-atomic reduction generators for reduction</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01898" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1898"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// operators defined by the OpenMP specification.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01899" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1899"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01900" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1900"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Generator for &#39;#omp reduction&#39;.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01901" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1901"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01902" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1902"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Emits the IR instructing the runtime to perform the specific kind of</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01903" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1903"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// reductions. Expects reduction variables to have been privatized and</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01904" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1904"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// initialized to reduction-neutral values separately. Emits the calls to</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01905" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1905"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// runtime functions as well as the reduction function and the basic blocks</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01906" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1906"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// performing the reduction atomically and non-atomically.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01907" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1907"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01908" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1908"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// The code emitted for the following:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01909" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1909"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01910" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1910"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// \\code</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01911" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1911"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///   type var&#95;1;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01912" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1912"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///   type var&#95;2;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01913" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1913"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///   #pragma omp &lt;directive&gt; reduction(reduction-op:var&#95;1,var&#95;2)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01914" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1914"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///   /&#42; body &#42;/;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01915" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1915"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// \\endcode</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01916" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1916"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01917" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1917"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// corresponds to the following sketch.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01918" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1918"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01919" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1919"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// \\code</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01920" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1920"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// void &#95;outlined&#95;par() &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01921" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1921"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///   // N is the number of different reductions.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01922" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1922"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///   void &#42;red&#95;array&#91;&#93; = &#123;privatized&#95;var&#95;1, privatized&#95;var&#95;2, ...&#125;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01923" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1923"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///   switch(&#95;&#95;kmpc&#95;reduce(..., N, /&#42;size of data in red array&#42;/, red&#95;array,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01924" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1924"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///                        &#95;omp&#95;reduction&#95;func,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01925" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1925"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///                        &#95;gomp&#95;critical&#95;user.reduction.var)) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01926" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1926"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///   case 1: &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01927" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1927"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///     var&#95;1 = var&#95;1 &lt;reduction-op&gt; privatized&#95;var&#95;1;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01928" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1928"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///     var&#95;2 = var&#95;2 &lt;reduction-op&gt; privatized&#95;var&#95;2;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01929" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1929"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///     // ...</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01930" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1930"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///    &#95;&#95;kmpc&#95;end&#95;reduce(...);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01931" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1931"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///     break;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01932" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1932"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///   &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01933" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1933"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///   case 2: &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01934" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1934"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///     &#95;Atomic&lt;ReductionOp&gt;(var&#95;1, privatized&#95;var&#95;1);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01935" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1935"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///     &#95;Atomic&lt;ReductionOp&gt;(var&#95;2, privatized&#95;var&#95;2);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01936" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1936"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///     // ...</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01937" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1937"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///     break;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01938" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1938"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///   &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01939" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1939"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///   default: break;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01940" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1940"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///   &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01941" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1941"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01942" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1942"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01943" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1943"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// void &#95;omp&#95;reduction&#95;func(void &#42;&#42;lhs, void &#42;&#42;rhs) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01944" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1944"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///   &#42;(type &#42;)lhs&#91;0&#93; = &#42;(type &#42;)lhs&#91;0&#93; &lt;reduction-op&gt; &#42;(type &#42;)rhs&#91;0&#93;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01945" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1945"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///   &#42;(type &#42;)lhs&#91;1&#93; = &#42;(type &#42;)lhs&#91;1&#93; &lt;reduction-op&gt; &#42;(type &#42;)rhs&#91;1&#93;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01946" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1946"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///   // ...</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01947" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1947"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01948" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1948"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// \\endcode</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01949" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1949"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01950" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1950"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// \\param Loc                The location where the reduction was</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01951" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1951"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///                           encountered. Must be within the associate</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01952" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1952"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///                           directive and after the last local access to the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01953" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1953"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///                           reduction variables.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01954" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1954"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// \\param AllocaIP           An insertion point suitable for allocas usable</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01955" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1955"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///                           in reductions.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01956" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1956"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// \\param ReductionInfos     A list of info on each reduction variable.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01957" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1957"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// \\param IsNoWait           A flag set if the reduction is marked as nowait.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01958" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1958"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// \\param IsByRef            A flag set if the reduction is using reference</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01959" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1959"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// or direct value.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01960" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1960"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/openmpirbuilder/#af24d1c61cec57095ced3b08a6dd99ee8">InsertPointOrErrorTy</a> createReductions(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/openmpirbuilder/locationdescription">LocationDescription</a> &amp;Loc,</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01965" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1965"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01966" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1966"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///&#125;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01967" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1967"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02829" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2829"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Create a unique name for the entry function using the source location</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02830" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2830"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// information of the current target region. The name will be something like:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02831" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2831"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02832" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2832"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// &#95;&#95;omp&#95;offloading&#95;DD&#95;FFFF&#95;PP&#95;lBB&#91;&#95;CC&#93;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02833" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2833"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02834" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2834"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// where DD&#95;FFFF is an ID unique to the file (device and file IDs), PP is the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02835" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2835"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// mangled name of the function that encloses the target region and BB is the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02836" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2836"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// line number of the target region. CC is a count added when more than one</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02837" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2837"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// region is located at the same location.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02838" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2838"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02839" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2839"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// If this target outline function is not an offload entry, we don&#39;t need to</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02840" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2840"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// register it. This may happen if it is guarded by an if clause that is</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02841" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2841"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// false at compile time, or no target archs have been specified.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02842" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2842"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02843" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2843"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// The created target region ID is used by the runtime library to identify</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02844" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2844"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// the current target region, so it only has to be unique and not</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02845" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2845"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// necessarily point to anything. It could be the pointer to the outlined</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02846" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2846"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// function that implements the target region, but we aren&#39;t using that so</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02847" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2847"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// that the compiler doesn&#39;t need to keep that, and could therefore inline</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02848" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2848"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// the host function if proven worthwhile during optimization. In the other</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02849" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2849"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// hand, if emitting code for the device, the ID has to be the function</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02850" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2850"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// address so that it can retrieved from the offloading entry and launched</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02851" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2851"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// by the runtime library. We also mark the outlined function to have</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02852" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2852"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// external linkage in case we are emitting code for the device, because</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02853" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2853"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// these functions will be entry points to the device.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02854" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2854"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02855" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2855"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// \\param InfoManager The info manager keeping track of the offload entries</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02856" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2856"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// \\param EntryInfo The entry information about the function</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02857" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2857"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// \\param GenerateFunctionCallback The callback function to generate the code</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02858" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2858"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// \\param OutlinedFunction Pointer to the outlined function</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02859" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2859"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// \\param EntryFnIDName Name of the ID o be created</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02860" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2860"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac226f3d2b9ca090171a8e0a8cb92c343a902b0d55fddef6f8d651fe1035b7d4bd">Error</a> emitTargetRegionFunction(TargetRegionEntryInfo &amp;EntryInfo,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02861" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2861"><Highlight kind="normal">                                 FunctionGenCallback &amp;GenerateFunctionCallback,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02862" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2862"><Highlight kind="normal">                                 </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> IsOffloadEntry, Function &#42;&amp;OutlinedFn,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02863" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2863"><Highlight kind="normal">                                 Constant &#42;&amp;OutlinedFnID);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02864" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2864"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02865" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2865"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Registers the given function and sets up the attribtues of the function</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02866" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2866"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Returns the FunctionID.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02867" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2867"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02868" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2868"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// \\param InfoManager The info manager keeping track of the offload entries</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02869" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2869"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// \\param EntryInfo The entry information about the function</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02870" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2870"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// \\param OutlinedFunction Pointer to the outlined function</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02871" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2871"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// \\param EntryFnName Name of the outlined function</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02873" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2873"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/isd/#a22ea9cec080dd5f4f47ba234c2f59110aac2f0a84dd2aa5ee4c3f1385e9565f5e">Constant</a> &#42;registerTargetRegionFunction(TargetRegionEntryInfo &amp;EntryInfo,</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02877" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2877"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02878" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2878"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Type of BodyGen to use for region codegen</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02879" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2879"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02880" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2880"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Priv: If device pointer privatization is required, emit the body of the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02881" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2881"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// region here. It will have to be duplicated: with and without</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02882" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2882"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// privatization.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02883" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2883"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// DupNoPriv: If we need device pointer privatization, we need</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02884" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2884"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// to emit the body of the region with no privatization in the &#39;else&#39; branch</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02885" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2885"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// of the conditional.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02886" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2886"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// NoPriv: If we don&#39;t require privatization of device</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02887" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2887"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// pointers, we emit the body in between the runtime calls. This avoids</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02888" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2888"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// duplicating the body code.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02889" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2889"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">enum</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> BodyGenTy &#123; Priv, DupNoPriv, NoPriv &#125;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02890" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2890"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02898" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2898"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Emit the array initialization or deletion portion for user-defined mapper</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02899" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2899"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// code generation. First, it evaluates whether an array section is mapped</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02900" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2900"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// and whether the \\a MapType instructs to delete this section. If \\a IsInit</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02901" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2901"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// is true, and \\a MapType indicates to not delete this array, array</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02902" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2902"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// initialization code is generated. If \\a IsInit is false, and \\a MapType</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02903" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2903"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// indicates to delete this array, array deletion code is generated.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02904" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2904"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> emitUDMapperArrayInitOrDel(Function &#42;MapperFn, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a066e2a31a13d6520e52ae1944f194662">llvm::Value</a> &#42;MapperHandle,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02905" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2905"><Highlight kind="normal">                                  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a066e2a31a13d6520e52ae1944f194662">llvm::Value</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sampleprof/#a702f69807459cc25db5754a5f179d3fcaf6fbeb8fa9f451468611536b00878d41">Base</a>, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a066e2a31a13d6520e52ae1944f194662">llvm::Value</a> &#42;Begin,</Highlight></CodeLine>
